body_content.explanation: a situation in which a long line of traffic is unable to travel forward because something is blocking the road:
examples: Many roadworks have been suspended to avoid further snarl-ups on the motorways.
Thousands of train drivers walked out last night causing London's worst travel snarl-up for two years.

body_content.explanation: a situation in which a system or organization does not work properly:
examples: A company facing snarl-ups can switch to another scheduling arrangement.
Overcrowding and baggage snarl-ups at Heathrow were beginning to hit the airline's revenues.
